desc: 루시아스의 문 너머로 펼쳐진 초원에 자생하는 영초.

dictionary.lore: Though previously only talked about in ancient manuscripts as a legendary holy grass, it has recently been confirmed to be growing beyond Lucius' Gate. It's extremely potent and its use requires caution, as if too much is given it can lead to poultry delusion syndrome, wherein the user believes they are a bird.

name: 황심초
